Name: *open
Doc: If True, this pane is visible on the page. If False, the pane is hidden.

Name: on_close
Doc:
The name of a function that is be triggered when this pane is closed (if the user clicks outside of it or presses the Esc key). All parameters of that function are optional:
  • gui instance
  • id
  • action
If this property is set to None, no function is called when this pane is closed.

Name: anchor
Doc:
Anchor side of the pane.
Valid values are "left", "right", "top" or "bottom".

Name: width
Doc: Width, in CSS units, of this pane. This is used only if anchor is "left" or "right".

Name: height
Doc: Height, in CSS units, of this pane. This is used only if anchor is "top" or "bottom".

Name: persistent
Doc: If True, the pane appears next to the page. If False, the pane covers the page where it appeared.
